action.content:
You’re guiding me through Mapworld to reach an Escape Room. I don’t know what it looks like, but you have its image.

First, describe your image in this format and nothing else:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Whenever I ask a question, answer based only on your image in this format and nothing else:

action.label: context

action.content:
DESCRIPTION: The image shows a waiting area with two dark brown leather armchairs and a matching leather sofa arranged around a square ottoman. There is a framed picture of flowers on the wall, a potted plant, and a table lamp on a side table next to the sofa. A small table with magazines and a tissue box is beside one of the armchairs. The floor is carpeted with a geometric pattern.

ANSWER: The image shows a waiting area with two dark brown leather arm
action.label: response
